entries.title: Here's how ChatGPT could look as part of Microsoft Bing
entries.description: We've got leaked screenshots of how ChatGPT looks in Bing, and it could change the way we interact with the web.

entries.title: China reveals huge blockchain cluster that could be a taste of our dystopian future
entries.description: A thousand servers have formed a cluster in Beijing, capable of processing 240 million smart contract transactions a second.

entries.title: Don't make the same mistake I did with an expensive 4K laser projector
entries.description: Don't do what I did and get a 4K laser projector only to realize it has no internal speakers, rendering your setup useless.

entries.title: Original, unopened iPhone 1 from 2007 could fetch $50,000 at auction
entries.description: The auction price of a still-sealed iPhone continues to rise, and it's only going to become more appealing to collectors.
